Class ec.ifc.app.ECWindowController

Class ec.ifc.app.ECWindowController 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ifc.app.ECWindowController
public class ECWindowController
extends Object
implements WindowController
A no-frills implementation of WindowController that controls an ECExternalWindow. getWindow() and setWindow() are left abstract for subclasses to implement.

ECWindowController()
Returns a new ECWindowController
ECWindowController(ECExternalWindow)
Returns a new ECWindowController that controls window

getWindow()
Returns the controlled window
hide()
Responsibility from WindowController; hides the controlled window.
performCommand(String, Object)
Responsibility from WindowController.
present()
Responsibility from WindowController.
reposition()
Responsibility from WindowController; does nothing here.
setWindow(Window)
Sets which window is controlled.
shouldRepositionBeforePresenting()
Responsibility from WindowController.

ECWindowController 
  public ECWindowController(ECExternalWindow window)
Returns a new ECWindowController that controls window
ECWindowController 
  public ECWindowController()
Returns a new ECWindowController

hide 
  public void hide()
Responsibility from WindowController; hides the controlled window.
performCommand 
  public void performCommand(String command,
                             Object arg)
Responsibility from WindowController. Handles WindowController.PRESENT_COMMAND by calling present()
present 
  public void present()
Responsibility from WindowController. Shows the window if necessary and brings it to the front. Does nothing if getWindow() returns null.
reposition 
  public void reposition()
Responsibility from WindowController; does nothing here. Override to position the window based on screen size, other window locations, etc.
shouldRepositionBeforePresenting 
  public boolean shouldRepositionBeforePresenting()
Responsibility from WindowController. Returns true if and only if the window has never been presented.
